Class NetworkController

Namespace
Nebula
Assembly
Nebula.dll

Manages the network state of a NetNode (including NetNode2D and NetNode3D).

[ScriptPath("res://addons/Nebula/Core/NetworkController.cs")]
public class NetworkController : RefCounted, IDisposable

Fields

DespawnOnUnowned

If true, the node will be despawned when the peer that owns it disconnects, otherwise the InputAuthority will simply be set to null.

public bool DespawnOnUnowned
